mapper.sql: id, ship_id, revolution_speed, host_load, running_hours, supercharger_speed, starting_air_pressure, tbbt, meav, meloip, mefc, meloot, meloit, sloip, sloot, fip, fit, pcoip, cloit, mejip, mejit, siep, siet, soet, control_air_pressure, smp, smt, runstatus1, sae1, pog1, ats1, alop1, alot1, afp1, aft1, runstatus2, sae2, pog2, ats2, alop2, alot2, afp2, aft2, runstatus3, sae3, pog3, ats3, alop3, alot3, afp3, aft3, boiler_steam_pressure, boiler_water_level, bot, stern_draught, stem_draft, starboard_draft, port_draft, `trim`, heel, mefit, mefif, mefof, gfif, gfof, bfoif, bfoof, sefif, sefof, device_name, source_id, create_time, update_time, collect_time, shaft_bearing_temp_fore, shaft_bearing_temp_aft, shaft_bearing_temp_inter, cool_sea_w_press, thrust_bearing_temp, oil_bunker_temp_l, oil_bunker_temp_r, oil_bunker_lev_l, oil_bunker_lev_r, diesel_fuel_tank_lev, generator_running_1, generator_running_2, generator_running_3, imo_number, `name`, data_sync_time, fcontrolAirPressure, fstartingAirPressure, air_main_fold_press, air_receiver_temp, gas_outlet_temp_1, fcontrol_air_pressure_2, fcontrol_air_pressure_3, fstarting_air_pressure_2, fstarting_air_pressure_3, gas_outlet_temp_2, gas_outlet_temp_3, fcontrol_air_pressure_1, fstarting_air_pressure_1
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(zjjkll,0)) AS zjjkll, ROUND(IFNULL(zjjkmd,0)) AS zjjkmd, ROUND(IFNULL(zjjkwd,0)) AS zjjkwd, ROUND(IFNULL(zjckll,0)) AS zjckll, ROUND(IFNULL(zjckmd,0)) AS zjckmd, ROUND(IFNULL(zjckwd,0)) AS zjckwd, ROUND(IFNULL(fdjjkll,0)) AS fdjjkll, ROUND(IFNULL(fdjjkmd,0)) AS fdjjkmd, ROUND(IFNULL(fdjjkwd,0)) AS fdjjkwd, ROUND(IFNULL(fdjckll,0)) AS fdjckll, ROUND(IFNULL(fdjckmd,0)) AS fdjckmd, ROUND(IFNULL(fdjckwd,0)) AS fdjckwd, ROUND(IFNULL(glll,0)) AS glll, ROUND(IFNULL(glmd,0)) AS glmd, ROUND(IFNULL(glwd,0)) AS glwd, ROUND(IFNULL(glckll,0)) AS glckll, ROUND(IFNULL(glckmd,0)) AS glckmd, ROUND(IFNULL(glckwd,0)) AS glckwd FROM t_ship_device_mod where ship_id = #{shipId} ORDER BY data_sync_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT starting_air_pressure as startingAirPressure, control_air_pressure as controlAirPressure, air_main_fold_press as airMainFoldPress, smt , mefc , fit , meloit , mejit , fip , meloip , mejip , cool_sea_w_press as coolSeaWPress, siet , soet , sloot , thrust_bearing_temp as thrustBearingTemp, shaft_bearing_temp_inter as shaftBearingTempInter, shaft_bearing_temp_fore as shaftBearingTempFore, shaft_bearing_temp_aft as shaftBearingTempAft, pst_power as pstPower, revolution_speed as revolutionSpeed FROM t_ship_device a LEFT JOIN t_ship_detail b ON a.collect_time = b.collect_time WHERE a.ship_id = #{shipId} and b.ship_id = #{shipId} ORDER BY a.collect_time DESC LIMIT 1
